I'm a Heritrix newbie - pardon me if this is a stupid question...

I've set the crawl scope to HostScope, but I can see in the report 
that Heritrix is visiting sites that are on completely different 
domains - not even just different hosts.  I've tried DomainScope too, 
but it seems to wander off too.

The profile I'm using is a copy of the "default" profile that comes 
standard with Heritrix.  The only things I have changed are the scope 
setting and the seeds (and of course the user-agent and from strings).
